caption: Token
description: The Token object contains the attributes pertaining to an API (Application Programming Interface) or client token, such as those created or granted by Identity Providers (IdPs) such as Okta or Microsoft Entra ID Application Registrations.
name: token

created_time.description: The time that the authentication token was created.

encryption_details.description: The encryption details of the authentication token.

expiration_time.description: The expiration time of the authentication token.

is_renewable.description: Indicates whether the authentication token is renewable.

type.description: The type of the authentication token.

type_id.description: The normalized authentication token type identifier.

0.caption: Unknown
0.description: The Authentication token type is unknown.
